name: Pull Up By Roots
description:
Two player battle game. 

The game of ginsengs pulling up the daikon with a limited time.  

SMASHING enemy's face is the best way to fight!!

P1:

[Move: Left Arrow & Right Arrow ] 

[Jump: Up Arrow]

[Pull Daikon Radish: Down Arrow] 

[Pull Daikon Radish: Down Arrow] 

[QTE Act Key: Space]

P2:

[Move: A&D ] 

[Jump: Up Arrow]

[Pull Daikon Radish: W] 

[Pull Daikon Radish: S] 

[QTE Act Key: Q]
